Text: Devastating news all days of our lives fans Jack,Carrie,Austin,Madison have all been fired from the show

What..!!When i just readed about your post "Devastating news" i thought that u will stop uploading days..!But when i read all of the post i unterstand all about.Thats terrible news mate because i like all of this charachters and Carrie is a beautiful woman.Not to mention that Carrie-Austin and Jack are all timers in the show and we get to used to watch them play in the older days.And we will love to see what will happen with Brady and Madison love afair and stuff..Finaly what can we do we will have to leave withough those guys.Thanks for the news friend @jmanwf and if u can keep the show rolling.

ffs I thought the same thing when I first read your comment but this is almost as bad if not worse :( I really like Carrie and without Austin there is no them :( Jack have been entertaining in the past as well but Madison I am not quite up to date with Days yet to speak about that chr :(
The main reason why they fired them is because they now have 2 new head writers as well
